question: This is my third preg. Earlier two preg were smooth. With this 3rd am in 10th week and experiencing spotting/mucus/ and slight cramp in my back. Went to doc she measured the sac and said it was not up to the mark since last u/s 10 days back. Gave progesterone inj and asked to wait for another week. In b/n any heavy bleeding I may lead to miscarriage. Plz suggest will sac rapidly grows in 10 days? Why am I experiencing bleeding. I have gestational diabetes too.
title: spotting/mucus/and little cramps 9wk
